reviewtext: I was confused about the difference between Hubs, Switches, and routers. I just wanted to take the Ethernet connection from my cable modem and split it to three other computers so that I could have a faster, direct connection since I have somewhat spotty wireless connection due to interference with neighbors routers. This switch did just the charm and was surprisingly inexpensive.So, if you have a modem with an Ethernet out and want to connect multiple computers to the internet, this device will work for you.
summary: Connected multiple computers to my cable modem perfectly!
